ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: What does this mean????
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Someone offered to pay my bard for playing mana song for her while she recovered from fighting a mob and in return gave me a velium shortsword which had
ygData.messageBody:
> It sounds like you have a Velium weapon. Those are pretty common
> anymore. They come in almost all weapon types and are easy to find.
> They usually go for around 10 plat. Most people use them because
> they are magic and they can hunt magic only mobs. Their ratios are
> good until about 20, then you should be able to get better.
>
> Tul
>
Someone offered to pay my bard for playing mana song for her while she
recovered from fighting a mob and in return gave me a velium shortsword
which had like dmg 10 delay 25 and procced the velium shards. Procs like 3
times in a battle. Very helpful. :-)
luv,
-Su
